file_content.text: Gray Secant extends orange parallel to you, noted test subject. You have been specially selected to conduct subanalysis of an unexpected yellow convex.
Several observation units left to study planets in your space have not submitted updated findings on schedule.
You will be marked for recognition by these observation units during matter recombination--please locate them and collect their data for Gray Secant.
Journey in purple tangent, test subject!
You return with the observation data intact! All progresses to red radian!
Your demonstrations of skill and ingenuity are worthy of continuous study. Take this sub-unit with you for further data collection.
To travel more easily alongside you, this unit will be designated in the manner of your culture: L1-L. Journey always toward purple tangent, noted test subject!
Your data-contributions are noteworthy, biped. Please continue.
